About

Hello there! I'm Prakash singh negi, a Frontend / Fullstack- web developer. I wake up in the morning, grab a cup of Tea, open up my laptop and build things that live on the web all day, everyday.

People who know me say I'm obsessed, that's fair, I am very driven and love learning new things.

I create web projects using MERN stack
